香港考試及評核局

公開考試資訊中心





Dear Sir/Madam,



Thank you for your email. Your email is now receiving attention and we will reply to you, where appropriate, as soon as possible. For further enquiries, please visit our website at www.hkeaa.edu.hk or contact us at 3628 8860.



Public Examinations Information Centre

Hong Kong Examinations and Assessment Authority
